targets.rawSql:
select time, mast.state 
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach
on mach.id = mast.machine_id
where mach.id = 2 and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '2d' AND NOW()
order by time desc
limit 1

select time, mast.state as "Status"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach
on mach.id = mast.machine_id
where $__timeFilter(time) and mach.id = 2
order by time desc

select time,
extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo",
extra_data ->> 'espessuraFinal' as "Espessura",
extra_data ->> 'nmEventoParada' as "Paradas"
from machines_data md 
inner join machines mach on md.machine_id = mach.id
where $__timeFilter(time) and mach.id = 2
order by time asc

select (select
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = 2 and state in ('5','4') and $__timeFilter(time)
group by machine_id) as UpTime,
(select 
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = 2 and $__timeFilter(time)
group by machine_id) as AllTime from machines_state ms2 
group by 1

select (select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = 2 and state in ('5') and $__timeFilter(time)
group by machine_id)/60 as "Máquina operando com OP",
(select
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = 2 and state in ('4') and $__timeFilter(time)
group by machine_id)/60 as "Máquina operando sem OP",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = 2  and state in ('3') and $__timeFilter(time)
group by machine_id)/60 as "Máquina parada",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = 2 and state in ('2') and $__timeFilter(time)
group by machine_id)/60 as "Máquina ociosa",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = 2 and state in ('1','0') and $__timeFilter(time)
group by machine_id)/60 as "Máquina desligada",
(select 
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = 2 and $__timeFilter(time)
group by machine_id)/60 as "Tempo total transcorrido" from machines_state ms2 
group by 1

select time, value as "Zona 1"
from machines_data md
where machine_id = '2' and sensor_id = '13' 
and $__timeFilter(time) 
order by time asc

select time, value as "Zona 2"
from machines_data
where machine_id = '2' and sensor_id = '14'
and $__timeFilter(time) 
order by time asc

select time, value as "Zona 3"
from machines_data
where machine_id = '2' and sensor_id = '15'
and $__timeFilter(time) 
order by time asc

select time, value as "Zona 4"
from machines_data
where machine_id = '2' and sensor_id = '16'
and $__timeFilter(time) 
order by time asc

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, '1h'), 
  sum(mada.value) as "Quantidade por hora" 
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mada.sensor_type = '01' and mach.id = 2 and mada.value < 200
and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '12 HOURS' AND NOW()
-- $__timeFilter("time") and 
GROUP by 1
ORDER BY time asc
limit 13
